SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: Página 49
Translation from PROLEG to PROLOG(ASP)
Consider the working example where P1 = {H1, E1} and H1 be the
following set of rules.
P<=.
Q<=.
and E1 be the following set of exceptions:
exception(P,Q).
exception(Q,R).
A model of this PROLEG program is {P, R}.
tre(P1) is as follows:
P: −not Q.
Q: −not R.
R.
A model of this PROLOG program is {P, R}.
49
